channel.title: Good source to host?
channel.description:
Hey, any recommendations on any good source I can host?
I am looking for a source that has good combat, most skills working (I don't want summoning & Dung) Good drops and a stable economy :)
My ideal source was Myth-Scape, but it has a problem.. when you hover over a skill it doesn't show you the xp :( If someone can find the fix for that i will be very thank full and will give you a rank when the server is online :) + You can download the source and try fix it :)
Fixing this problem is very hard as they're no TUT's on this issue.. so if you can fix this then you are awesome ;)
Download link for the source: http://uppit.com/7nxk5itbfw56/Myth-Scape.zip
But if you can not fix it please send me a link to good source.
Thank you and i hope you can help me :)

item.title: Good source to host?
item.dc:creator: @Noob_I_Own_U Noob I Own U
item.description:
@Noob_I_Own_U wrote:

Thanks ill try find a source from that list but ill be very happy if someone could fix my old source

Read full topic

item.title: Good source to host?
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,488887.0.html - you will find one you like.

Read full topic

item.title: Good source to host?
item.dc:creator: @Noob_I_Own_U Noob I Own U
item.description:
@Noob_I_Own_U wrote:

Yeah I’m still looking for another one & I tried fixing Myth-Scape but failed >:(, Do you think you can help me please?

Read full topic

item.title: Good source to host?
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

  1. Check the download section for something to leech.
  2. If none of them satisfies you, make your own source.
  3. Fix Myth-Scape yourself, don’t be lazy.

Thanks, hope I helped.

Read full topic
